knimeNode.name: Active Learn Annotator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Active Learn node that provides a JavaScript annotation view. Required for Webportal annotation.

tab.name: Node Options
tab.option: The column which value will be shown in the detailed view area of View.
The Port the view will use to use to communicate with the node's server, must be unique for each JS-View. Reseting the node releases the port.

The address of the KNIME server the workflow is running on, this option is only needed when the node is run on a KNIME Server.
Has to be preceded by "http(s)://".

ports.inPort: The intended result of the Active Learn Process
ports.outPort: The result of the Active Learn Process
